xml.data:
Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 2 Kusalattika, Hetugocchaka » 2.6 Kusalattika, Nahetusahetukaduka » 2.6.2 Nahetuahetukapada
Hetu
Kusalattika, Hetugocchaka
Kusalattika, Nahetusahetukaduka
Nahetuahetukapada
Hetu
40.
1083Abyākataṃ nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1084Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1085Nahetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  novigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1086(Sahajātavārampi…pe…  sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
41.
1087Abyākato nahetu ahetuko dhammo abyākatassa nahetussa ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1088Ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1089(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
1090Hetugocchakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
